body:
5 words, school, priorities, family, friends, Life!

You get the jizz, but yes if you guys noticed im never on, so lemm recap, my iTerraCubist got hacked yatayatayata then i got the alt SwordArtOnlineII yatayatayata then i got a new main MySoulYourBeats (which rn i intentionally had myself banned for reasons you wouldnt get, besides me waiting for new internet and so i can grind on getting higher max damage on AoT Tribute Game = good game btw! And also school, thnx to 1gud and Ethe xoxo) and now im just waiting for my new internet to come this weekend or so, btw dont ask why i decided to let myself get banned for 3 days, just like DaFrozenBlaze, you will never get me, and lastly (emphasis on the quote) im "that something else " in this community i guess, im just weird pretty much, if i lag and complain, or talk bout my wish for 2KD or end up talking anime or some random yatas, thats just how i decided to be online, and btw, just a quick suggestion on the combat log thing, why not setup like a timer like when youre in combat in factions, so ppl cant just disconnect or take advantage of the /leave (here comes the questions like "why do you even yatayatayata?") Anyways rant over.

~ That something else

title: Where have i been?

Anyway that's not my thread, let's not hijack it xD
